content: आरभ् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To begin, commence, undertake; आरभंतेऽल्पमेवाज्ञाः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; आरब्धा बलिविग्रहं <ls>Bk. 5. 38.</ls> {@--2@} To be active or energetic, be busy; अप्यनारभमाणस्य <ls>Śi. 2. 91.</ls> {@--3@} To rely on. {@--4@} To reach or attain to, obtain. {@--5@} To seize, grasp. {@--6@} To form, make; भूतैः पंचभिरारब्धे देहे <ls>Bhāg.</ls>
